TopicTitle: Could It Have Been Something I've Done?

Articles.Content:
Hi Guys & Gals

I've been playing this game for a couple of months. First starting with the 0.20.2 version and all worked well enjoying it from git to go! I then saw some videos regarding MechJeb 1.9.8 and in my game it went. That worked as well. a while later my game made me aware of a recent KSP update (0.21.1). I put that in and all the extra parts became available. Cool! Getting used to things, I thought,

On YouTube I noticed a video with a link to the Kerbal Spaceport to download [0.21.1] KW Rocketry v2.5

try my hand at at the larger rockets.

Somewhere along the line something went awry. No matter which, where or how I place an SAS module, it will not light up or function before during or after launch when it's selected, as well as the RCS. The Mechjeb, which worker fine before will now only give me bits of info during ascent autopilot, otherwise will not function either. The camera functions are off their rocker as well. The cameras will not remain in position when 'V' keyed to the desired aspect.

Ive deleted everything KSP on my system and tried reloading it. I've tried reloading the original version I joined with (0.20.2) alone, to loading 0.21.1 alone. No mods or anything. I'm completely baffled.

Any ideas will be respectfully appreciated! Meanwhile I'll continue to try to locate delete and reload in hopes to get it to normalize.
You need to update MJ to 2.0.9. Older versions don't work with KSP 0.21.1.

There was an important leave-out. My apologies. From the start I used a Saitek X52-Pro joystick and throttle w/o problems as well until this issue.

As an update, I once again reloaded the game (0.21.1 version), this time not assigning the Saitek this time and the SAS & RCS is functioning. I'll need to reload the mods next and then the Saitek to see where it sets. Will accomplish that as soon as I can and post it here.

You need to update MJ to 2.0.9. Older versions don't work with KSP 0.21.1.

Apparently the older version 1.9.8 doesn't work in the older KSP 0.20.1 either. At least in my sys. This game used to be fun, at least for the short I've had it for.
